attributes.title: Like for part two
attributes.review: So it all started out a normal day as I was taking my pet rolly polly on a motorcycle ride. Then I saw something crunchy floating on a cloud first I was was positive it was my boyfriends sisters cousins nephews dads great aunt Lucy but then noticed it was my brothers grandma . Like duh . Sorry I’m running out of time but like for part two👍

attributes.title: Virus
attributes.review: This app gave my phone a virus, I hear the lack of research into this app spread the virus to 130,000 phones. The trump app needs to be taken out of the App Store because of it’s incompetence of the phone’s well-being.

attributes.title: im a victim of this app
attributes.review: my name is sarah cameron and i am a victim my birthday is 4/20/69 and i am 69 years old this app sexual assaulted me i have nightmares 😿 i cant sleep at night and i have PTSD this app needs to be taken down emidtly one night i got on the app to support my beloved rasict homophobic phedofile of a president and as i was looking thru the news HIS FACE the rasict homophobic mygonistic phedofile president guy came up on the screen IT SCARED ME HALF TO DEATH i was so incredibly scared that my phat juicy vigana started ⭕️💢⭕️💢⭕️💢 and it tore apart and its stuck in the gutter 😿😭😭im sorry im getting emotional 😿😿 but this is my story and i would like to pass it on and tell u why u shouldnt get this app i cant really spell or do alegbra 😉 hey twin ❤️
attributes.userName: get ur head out of the gutter

attributes.title: Danger This App is Bad News
attributes.review:
This App copied all contacts and deleted my photos Albums!! All of them! I then noticed all my banking and contacts were being downloaded and then this message appears in Russian вас взломали
Do yourself a favor- AVOID this APP!! Find another way to show your support!
